labels.fit: Loose, flowy dress with fitted cardigan

feedback.fit: The loose dress paired with the fitted cardigan creates a nice balanced silhouette. Consider belting the dress to define the waist more.
feedback.color: The pink and black color combo is classic and feminine. Adding another pop of color could liven up the look.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedges complement the outfit but a lighter, neutral sandal could further the breezy summer vibe.
feedback.accessories: Some simple jewelry like a long pendant necklace or bangles could elevate this basic look.
feedback.style: Overall this is a cute, girly casual look perfect for everyday. Small tweaks could take it to the next level.

feedback.fit: The loose, flowy fit of the chambray dress looks effortless and comfortable. The rolled sleeves add a casual touch.
feedback.color: The light blue chambray pairs nicely with the cognac brown boots for an earthy palette. The black necklace adds a bit of contrast.
feedback.footwear: The ankle boots ground the look and give it a slightly edgy vibe that works well with the casual dress.
feedback.accessories: The long black necklace and sunglasses are simple additions that elevate the look. A crossbody bag could also work well.
feedback.style: This outfit nails casual chic style - fashionable yet relaxed and perfect for many occasions.

feedback.fit: The relaxed fit of the tee and shorts is appropriate for a casual, active look. Tucking in the front of the tee could polish it up a bit.
feedback.color: The mint green shorts add a nice pop of color. Pairing them with more green tones could create a fresh color story.
feedback.footwear: The brown sandals are practical and work with the neutral tones, but white sneakers could give a crisper, sportier vibe.
feedback.accessories: A baseball cap, fabric headband or sporty watch could enhance the athletic aesthetic.
feedback.style: This is a solid casual outfit for relaxing or light activity. A few small changes could really play up the sporty style.

feedback.fit: The fitted tank tucked into the flared skater skirt creates a flirty, feminine silhouette that highlights the waist.
feedback.color: The bold red skirt makes a statement, balanced by the white lace tank. Classic color combo that reads youthful and fresh.
feedback.footwear: The black knee socks and ankle boots add an unexpected edge, dressing down the flirty skirt in a cool way.
feedback.accessories: A few dainty jewelry pieces like a charm bracelet or stud earrings could add a sweet, girly touch.
feedback.style: This look nails the flirty skater skirt style, combining feminine pieces with a slight edge for a fun, stylish result.

feedback.fit: The loose fit of the tank dress looks casual and breezy for summer. Defining the waist with a thin belt could flatter the figure more.
feedback.color: The soft mint green is a pretty, subtle color but can wash out fair skin tones. Choosing a bolder shade could pop more.
feedback.footwear: The tan wedges are neutral and summery but blending in with the model's skin tone. A metallic or cognac sandal could anchor the look better.
feedback.accessories: Sunglasses are a start but this simple look leaves lots of room for accessorizing with jewelry, a sunhat, tote bag, etc.
feedback.style: This outfit is a good basic template for casual summer style but could use more personal touches and styling to really shine.

labels.fit: Loose cardigan, fitted tank and shorts
labels.top_type: Mint green cardigan and cream tank top

feedback.fit: The drapey cardigan over the fitted tank and shorts creates a nice play on proportions. Rolling up the shorts a bit could elongate the leg line.
feedback.color: The mint and cream combo is soft and pretty. Introducing another color like coral or yellow could add more interest.
feedback.footwear: The brown wedges pick up the bohemian vibe and look comfortable for walking. A metallic flat sandal could dress it up for evening.
feedback.accessories: The flower crown is a whimsical touch. Stacking some bangles or adding a fringed crossbody bag could really drive home the boho style.
feedback.style: This look has a romantic, free-spirited aesthetic. Pushing the bohemian elements even further would make it feel more styled and intentional.

feedback.fit: The swingy shape of this tank dress is flattering and looks cool and comfortable for summer. It highlights the upper body and flows away from the hips.
feedback.color: The golden mustard yellow is an unexpected, retro-inspired choice that really wows. Pairing it with the bright turquoise necklace is genius.
feedback.footwear: The red ballet flats add another pop of color that feels vintage-inspired, feminine and fun. They balance out the statement necklace.
feedback.accessories: The bold bib necklace makes the outfit, injecting color and style. The sunglasses are practical and chic. No other accessories needed.
feedback.style: This look perfectly embodies retro-inspired feminine style, from the 60s silhouette to the color combo. Flirty, fashionable and fun.

feedback.fit: The oversized blazer overwhelms the model's frame, as does the long, loose skirt. More tailored pieces would be more figure-flattering.
feedback.color: The color palette feels a bit drab and dated. A crisp white blazer or bolder colored skirt could modernize it.
feedback.footwear: The black pumps are a professional choice but look heavy for the season. Nude or metallic pumps could lighten the look.
feedback.accessories: The black accessories get lost in the dark blazer. A pop of color or pattern in the belt or clutch could add some personality.
feedback.style: While headed in the right direction for business casual, this outfit lacks polish and style. Better tailoring and color choices could really elevate it.

labels.fit: Fitted tank top and skinny jeans

feedback.fit: The fitted tank and skinny jeans create a sleek, long silhouette that shows off the model's figure. The scarf adds volume up top for balance.
feedback.color: The all-black palette is chic and allows the bright red accents to really pop. The purple undertones in the hair tie the look together.
feedback.footwear: The red peep-toe pumps elongate the leg line and add a sexy, feminine touch. They make a statement against the black outfit.
feedback.accessories: The bold red scarf makes the look, adding color and style. The black bag is practical and doesn't compete. No jewelry needed.
feedback.style: This outfit nails edgy chic style - a monochrome base with pops of color, sleek lines and a bit of attitude. Very fashionable and put-together.

accessories: Black and white polka dot bag

feedback.fit: The swingy shape of the tank dress is comfortable and emphasizes the upper body. Belting it could create more waist definition if desired.
feedback.color: The vibrant orange color looks great with the model's dark hair and reads as fun and energetic for summer.
feedback.footwear: The black and white cutout wedges add wonderful graphic interest and quirky style. They pair nicely with the simple dress.
feedback.accessories: The polka dot bag ties in with the shoes and adds another whimsical element. A stack of bangles could be a nice addition.
feedback.style: This look has a playful, feminine vibe with a bit of quirk. The shoes and bag show personal style that elevates the basic dress.
